title: Cashew Whipped Cream
description: Thick whipped cream with a subtle flavor
notes: This is great on fruit, but has a present nutty flavor that has to be accounted for.
steps: Blend all the ingredients until smooth.
Refrigerate for a few hours, until the cream is thick and can be spooned out
source: The Homemade Vegan Pantry, Miyoko Schinner
